query:
SELECT 
  COUNT(*) as total_orders,
  SUM(CASE WHEN staffName IS NOT NULL AND staffName != '' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as with_staff,
  SUM(CASE WHEN staffName IS NULL OR staffName = '' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as without_staff
FROM sales 
WHERE saleType = 'online' AND orderDate >= '2026-01-01' AND orderDate < '2026-02-01'
